title: my ping is 90-120 and fps 200 but lag
body: this has happened for over 3 weeks now and it makes the game unplayable , out of nowhere i cant still move in game but all attack animations are gone and creeps health bars go down to 0 but they are still alive and attacking and when u try to purchase an item it doesnt show but this is fixed by dc and rc to game but then it happens again i tried everything they say on the forums but nothing works

replies.body: It does sound like you're having some input delays or lag spikes, which can be caused by packet lost or more local issues.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and resolve this.  Let me know if your issue persists!
